hizbs.text: qala qarinuhu rabbana ma atghaytuhu walakin kana fi dalalin baʿidin
qala la takhtasimu ladayya waqad qaddamtu ilaykum bil-waʿidi
ma yubaddalu l-qawlu ladayya wama ana bizallamin lil'ʿabidi
yawma naqulu lijahannama hali im'talati wataqulu hal min mazidin
wa-uz'lifati l-janatu lil'muttaqina ghayra baʿidin
hadha ma tuʿaduna likulli awwabin hafizin
man khashiya l-rahmana bil-ghaybi wajaa biqalbin munibin
ud'khuluha bisalamin dhalika yawmu l-khuludi
lahum ma yashauna fiha waladayna mazidun
wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin hum ashaddu min'hum batshan fanaqqabu fi l-biladi hal min mahisin
inna fi dhalika ladhik'ra liman kana lahu qalbun aw alqa l-samʿa wahuwa shahidun
walaqad khalaqna l-samawati wal-arda wama baynahuma fi sittati ayyamin wama massana min lughubin
fa-is'bir ʿala ma yaquluna wasabbih bihamdi rabbika qabla tuluʿi l-shamsi waqabla l-ghurubi
wamina al-layli fasabbih'hu wa-adbara l-sujudi
wa-is'tamiʿ yawma yunadi l-munadi min makanin qaribin
yawma yasmaʿuna l-sayhata bil-haqi dhalika yawmu l-khuruji
inna nahnu nuh'yi wanumitu wa-ilayna l-masiru
yawma tashaqqaqu l-ardu ʿanhum siraʿan dhalika hashrun ʿalayna yasirun
nahnu aʿlamu bima yaquluna wama anta ʿalayhim bijabbarin fadhakkir bil-qur'ani man yakhafu waʿidi
wal-dhariyati dharwan
fal-hamilati wiq'ran
fal-jariyati yus'ran
fal-muqasimati amran
innama tuʿaduna lasadiqun
wa-inna l-dina lawaqiʿun
wal-samai dhati l-hubuki
innakum lafi qawlin mukh'talifin
yu'faku ʿanhu man ufika
qutila l-kharasuna
alladhina hum fi ghamratin sahuna
yasaluna ayyana yawmu l-dini
yawma hum ʿala l-nari yuf'tanuna
dhuqu fit'natakum hadha alladhi kuntum bihi tastaʿjiluna
inna l-mutaqina fi jannatin waʿuyunin
akhidhina ma atahum rabbuhum innahum kanu qabla dhalika muh'sinina
kanu qalilan mina al-layli ma yahjaʿuna
wabil-ashari hum yastaghfiruna
wafi amwalihim haqqun lilssaili wal-mahrumi
wafi l-ardi ayatun lil'muqinina
wafi anfusikum afala tub'siruna
wafi l-samai riz'qukum wama tuʿaduna
fawarabbi l-samai wal-ardi innahu lahaqqun mith'la ma annakum tantiquna
hal ataka hadithu dayfi ib'rahima l-muk'ramina
idh dakhalu ʿalayhi faqalu salaman qala salamun qawmun munkaruna
faragha ila ahlihi fajaa biʿij'lin saminin
faqarrabahu ilayhim qala ala takuluna
fa-awjasa min'hum khifatan qalu la takhaf wabasharuhu bighulamin ʿalimin
fa-aqbalati im'ra-atuhu fi sarratin fasakkat wajhaha waqalat ʿajuzun ʿaqimun
qalu kadhaliki qala rabbuki innahu huwa l-hakimu l-ʿalimu
